title: Ghost in the Shell: Arise
resume: In 2027, Motoko Kusanagi is a highly skilled agent of the military  that meets Daisuke Aramaki, former soldier who is currently the chief  of Public Security Section 9. Their encounter sparks the assembly of an  elite new unit within Section 9.
